name: My Virtual Neighbor
overview:
My Virtual Neighbor is an online community where you can connect with those close by and discover what’s around your neighborhood, what your neighbors recommend and who has interests similar to yours.

You can join the website through connecting your social media accounts like Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn or your email address if you wish to keep your accounts separate.

All you need is a desire to connect with your neighbors- whether it is a neighborhood, apartment complex, interest-based group or commercial building where you might find it beneficial for businesses to connect since you share the halls with them. You can sign up and invite your neighbors- there’s no need to share your personal address, just the community name. You can even request a password to make it a private community.
